title: Stay signed in

milestone.title: User Preferences
milestone.description:
Add user preferences to adjust settings:

1) Radius
2) Filter by: (ex. popular, etc.)
3) Sign out/change account

Also, add option to stay signed in on login screen.

body: Include an option on the log-in page for user to stay signed in after exiting the app. This would allow users to open the app and go straight to the feed, without authorizing Twitter account again.

title: Snap to user location on open of MapActivity
body: Upon opening the map, the map does not snap to the user's current location. Currently, users have to click the myLocation button for that to happen.
